testName: Login with empty username and password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the login fails and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Login when ParaBank is not accessible

steps.step: Navigate to an invalid ParaBank URL (e.g., 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/invalid')
Verify the application is not accessible and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
